entry.title: ğŸ‰ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a â­ï¸

entry.title: Super Mega Lucky Box
entry.content:
Discount Informationï¼ˆPriceï¼š2,99Â â‚¬ â†’ 0,99Â â‚¬ [0,99Â â‚¬ ~ 2,99Â â‚¬]ï¼‰

All Price Information

Priceï¼š0,99Â â‚¬

Application Description

In this spectacular game of colossal fun, reveal numbers one-by-one and close a corresponding square on one of your cards. Your goal is to score as many points as possible, and you'll do that mostly by crossing off the nine numbers printed in a 3x3 grid. Get three-in-a-row to unlock bonuses, which can help you close more squares and trigger even more bonuses. Use Lightning tokens to nudge numbers to your liking, but donâ€™t forget about Moon tokens to avoid an end-game penalty. At the end of a round, you score points for each card that you've completely marked off, with the points diminishing each round from 15 in round one to 8 in round four. After four rounds, you score 1 point for each two spaces Xed on unfinished cards. Together with your points from completed cards, stars and moons, this determines your total score. The App offers you weekly single-user challenges in 3 game modes with varying degrees of randomness, so you can compete with players from all over the world in the highscore lists. But of course you also can just play for yourself and collec tg various achievements. Awards 2022 Tric Trac Nominee 2022 Mensa Recommended 2021 Cardboard Republic Socializer Laurel Nominee

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

Ou vÃ¡ para a pista de corrida e tente ultrapassÃ¡-la no menor tempo para obter a recompensa mÃ¡xima. Outro modo Ã© o drift, onde vocÃª pode testar suas habilidades de drifting e ganhar pontos por Ã¢ngulos de derrapagem rÃ¡pidos e agudos. VocÃª precisarÃ¡ de pontos para abrir os novos veÃ­culos, modos e outros recursos do jogo. Este simulador de corrida oferece a possibilidade de escolher o estilo de conduÃ§Ã£o que pode ser tranquilo e seguro ou corridas extremamente perigosas. A abundÃ¢ncia de configuraÃ§Ãµes permite que vocÃª personalize um nÃ­vel de realismo da fÃ­sica do carro, desde nÃ­veis de arcade e simulaÃ§Ã£o atÃ© os mais realistas, como no difÃ­cil simulador de corrida em que vocÃª precisarÃ¡ mostrar suas habilidades de direÃ§Ã£o.
